description: This file defines an Angular component 'CartComponent' responsible for managing and displaying the shopping cart in the application. It interacts with a CartService to load cart data, update item quantities, remove items, and clear the cart, handling async operations and UI state signals.

classes.name: CartComponent
classes.description: An Angular component that manages the shopping cart page, including loading cart items, updating quantities, removing items, and clearing the cart.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes the component, calling refresh to load cart data on component load.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches the latest cart data from the server, updating items, total, and loading/error states.

methods.name: updateQty
methods.description: Updates the quantity of a specific cart item based on user input, triggering the CartService update method.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a specific item from the cart via the CartService.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the entire cart after user confirmation, then reloads cart data.

ctags.name: g
ctags.pattern: /^    const g = typeof globalThis !== "undefined" ? (globalThis as any) : undefined;$/
